items.title: Affirm shares soar 22% on revenue beat, surprise profit during holiday period
items.description: The buy now, pay later company topped Wall Street's fiscal second-quarter revenue forecast and posted a surprise profit amid a strong holiday shopping...

items.title: Doximity shares soar 25% after company beats on revenue, raises fiscal-year guidance
items.description: Doximity reported third-quarter fiscal 2025 results that beat analysts' expectations for revenue and guidance.

items.title: Affirm shares pop more than 15% on revenue beat
items.description: Affirm beats on earnings and revenue in fiscal second quarter.

items.title: Pinterest shares rocket 17% on strong revenue and user growth
items.description: Pinterest shares surged after the company topped Wall Street's fourth-quarter estimates and showed robust user growth from a year ago.

items.title: Amazon fourth-quarter cloud revenue falls just shy of Wall Street estimates
items.description: All three of the top companies providing cloud-based computing and storage delivered less fourth-quarter revenue from this category than expected.
